feature.label: XSTPA Feature
feature.description: This feature provides extended features to the stpa method. By installing this feature the stpa analysis implemented in the A-Stpa plug-in will be extended by additional steps which allow you to set up a context table of the analysed software system and derive refined rules,safety constraints and LTL Formulas
